The Simple Problem

28 Feb 2020

I like having simple as an objective.

Simple, to me, is a close cousin to tranquility, virtue, compassion, meaning, and beauty.

The problem with simple is that the world is not so. Simple can always be effectively undermined by one word - why - leading to the messiness and complexity of the world.

So the goal canâ€™t be simply simple. It is more like containing the complexity of the world in your version of simple.
